message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a living. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make $110 to break even. How about we meet at $110?
I'm still a bit above my budget, can we try $105? I really think this product would be a great fit for me.
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate that. However, I need to make a profit, so I can only go up to $115. That's the lowest I can go. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm not quite there. Can we meet at $108? I really think this product is worth it to me.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $112. That's as low as I can go.
I really like the product, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can we try $109? I'm willing to make a final push to get it.

I can see you're really serious about this product, Bob. I'm not going to go any lower than $115, but I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a free accessory that normally costs $20. That's the best I can do.
I appreciate the extra incentive, but I'm still not willing to go above $110. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at that price.
